ops.description: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {GRAY}Back then…
I only got
scraped knees…{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“…What do you mean by 'back then'?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {GRAY}What about now?
Can you get up?{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“…What do you mean by 'back then'?
…What about now?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // {GRAY}…Don't worry about me.
Worry about yourself now.{GRAY}

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {GRAY}Take it slow now.
Little by little……{GRAY}
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:2, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:56}); // {Cloud}
“The name's {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“Me?
I do a little bit of everything.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:58}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah, I do whatever's needed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // {Cloud}
“What's so funny?
What are you laughing at?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:69}); // {Cloud}
“OK…
but it'll cost you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Cloud}
“Nowadays you can find Materia anywhere.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Cloud}
“…good for nothing?
You just don't know how to use it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:64}); // {Aeris}
“Say, {Cloud}.
Have you ever been a bodyguard?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:66}); // {Aeris}
“You CAN do anything, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:68}); // {Aeris}
“Then, get me out of here.
Take me home.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:71}); // {Aeris}
“How about
if I go out with you once?”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // “Say, do you have any Materia?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // “But mine is special.
It's good for absolutely nothing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // “No, I do…
it just doesn't do anything.”{PAUSE}“I feel safe just having it.
It was my mother's.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:46}); // “Wait here.
I've got to check my flowers.
It'll just be a minute.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // “Ahhh. I wonder whose fault that is.
It's not easy to grow them, you know.
Poor flowers.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:1, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // “This is a church in
the Sector 5 slums.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “You just fell from above.
You really gave me a scare.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // “The roof and the flower bed
must have broken your fall.
You're lucky.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // “That's all right.
The flowers here are quite resilient
because this is a sacred place.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // “They say grass and flowers
won't grow in Midgar.”{PAUSE}“But for some reason, they
have no trouble blooming here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:62}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}!
Don't let it get to you!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:73}); // “I'll give you a little more time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:76}); // Reno
“Yeah, all right.
C'mon, get to work.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:78}); // Reno
“And don't step on the flowers…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:79}); // “You just stepped on them yourself!”
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:81}); // “You're gonna catch holy hell!”

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“…What do you mean by 'back then'?
…What about now?”

{GRAY}…Don't worry about me.
Worry about yourself now.{GRAY}

“You just fell from above.
You really gave me a scare.”

“This is a church in
the Sector 5 slums.”

“The roof and the flower bed
must have broken your fall.
You're lucky.”

“That's all right.
The flowers here are quite resilient
because this is a sacred place.”

“They say grass and flowers
won't grow in Midgar.”{PAUSE}“But for some reason, they
have no trouble blooming here.”

“Don't you remember me?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, I remember…
{CHOICE}Never saw you before

{Cloud}
“Yeah, I remember…”
You were selling flowers
You're the slum drunk

“…I guess you don't remember.
You were walking in a daze.”
“You didn't buy any flowers from me though.”

“But I forgive you,
because you bought flowers from me.”

“But mine is special.
It's good for absolutely nothing.”

{Cloud}
“…good for nothing?
You just don't know how to use it.”

“No, I do…
it just doesn't do anything.”{PAUSE}“I feel safe just having it.
It was my mother's.”

“Say, I feel like talking.
Do you feel up to it?”{PAUSE}“After all,
here we are meeting again.”
{CHOICE}I don't mind
{CHOICE}Got nothing to talk about

“Wait here.
I've got to check my flowers.
It'll just be a minute.”

“Ahhh. I wonder whose fault that is.
It's not easy to grow them, you know.
Poor flowers.”
“We don't know each other's names, do we?”

“I'm {Aeris}, the flower girl.
Nice to meet you.”

“I'm {Aeris}, the flower girl.
Nice to meet you.”

{Cloud}
“The name's {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“Me?
I do a little bit of everything.”

{Cloud}
“What's so funny?
What are you laughing at?”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}!
Don't let it get to you!”

{Aeris}
“Say, {Cloud}.
Have you ever been a bodyguard?”

{Aeris}
“Then, get me out of here.
Take me home.”

{Aeris}
“How about
if I go out with you once?”
“I'll give you a little more time.”

Reno
“Did you see that guy's eyes.”

Reno
“Yeah, all right.
C'mon, get to work.”

Reno
“And don't step on the flowers…”
